mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message ( mid, sender, recipient, subject, cont, deleted ) VALUES ( message_seq.NEXTVAL, #{SENDER}, #{RECIPIENT}, #{SUBJECT}, #{CONTENTS}, 'N' )
mapper.update: UPDATE message SET deleted = 'Y' WHERE mid = #{MID}
mapper.select: SELECT mid, sender, subject, writeday FROM message WHERE recipient = #{RECIPIENT} AND deleted = 'N'
SELECT mid, sender, subject, writeday FROM message WHERE recipient = #{RECIPIENT} AND sender LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHKEY}||'%' AND deleted = 'N'
SELECT mid, sender, subject, writeday FROM message WHERE recipient = #{RECIPIENT} AND subject LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHKEY}||'%' AND deleted = 'N'
SELECT mid, sender, subject, writeday FROM message WHERE recipient = #{RECIPIENT} AND cont LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHKEY}||'%' AND deleted = 'N'

SELECT mid, sender, subject, writeday FROM message WHERE recipient = #{RECIPIENT} AND writeday >= TO_DATE(#{SEARCHKEY},'YYYY/MM/DD') AND writeday < TO_DATE(#{SEARCHKEY},'YYYY/MM/DD')+1 AND deleted = 'N'
SELECT mid, sender, subject, cont, writeday FROM message WHERE mid = #{MID} AND deleted = 'N'
